Company Details :
Nexus Home lets you manage your Home from anywhere, anytime!
Manage your Home Security, IR remote controlled electronic devices, Brilliant WiFi devices from anywhere in the world with one simple Nexus Home App.

If you have any problem when you use this skill, you can contact us with email: richard.sima@brilliantlighting.com.au

Amazon Alexa and the Nexus Home products work together to help you control home appliances nicely and easily.
You can simply ask Alexa to turn on, turn off, or set the brightness of the light.
There’s no need to go to the switch to adjust your home light - just talk to Alexa on your Amazon Echo, Echo Dot, Amazon Tap, or Echo Show.
After connecting Alexa to your Nexus Home Smart products in a few simple steps:
(1). Download our "Nexus Home" app in android or ios app market;
(2). Register one Nexus Home account in our "Nexus Home" app;
(3). You need to add some IR controlled devices like AC, TV, etc;
(4). You need to import some brilliant smart devices in "Nexus Home" app which is already configured in " Brilliant smart" app 
(Make sure brilliant smart devices have an appropriate name which will be used in "Nexus Home" skills) ;
(5). Download Amazon "Alexa" app from android, ios or Amazon app market;
(6). Configure Echo with "Alexa" app;
(7). Search "Nexus Home" skill from the "Alexa" app skills category;
(8). Click Enable skill of "Nexus Home", and you'll be navigated to nexus home login page;
(9). Input your Nexus Home account username and password, you'll be redirected to the success page;
(10). Now all setup is finished.
You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:
“Alexa, discover devices.”
"Alexa, turn on bedroom AC."
"Alexa, turn set bedroom AC to 20"
"Alexa, channel up on bedroom TV."
"Alexa, mute bedroom TV."
"Alexa, volume up on bedroom TV."
“Alexa, turn on the bedroom light.”
“Alexa, turn off the bedroom light.”
“Alexa set bedroom light to 50%.”

Currently, this skill supports products:
AC, TV and other IR supported devices, smart bulb, smart switches, Zigbee lights
